text: @SiegelAtty I guess they are eager to see if they are too macho to catch Covid19. Well lots of athletes have succumbed to it and he does not look like A field and track, Rugby, or other strong athelete. He looks like the kind of dude who carries ab assault weapon for A penis extension.
